attributes.action: Change to the law on dog in dog attacks. Making the owners liable.
attributes.additional_details:
The law to change on dog on dog attacks holding the owner/s liable. 
With fines and sanctions on owning a dog again.
attributes.background:
Since covid lockdown there has been a steep rise in dog attacks. Wether on person or dogs. 
When a person is attacked the owner is liable and the dog is put down.
When a dog is viscously attacked for no reason being badly wounded or killed.
The police won't pursue as there is no law against it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598977
